snippet: A new twist on the idea of crowdsourcing speed traps is unveiled at C.E.S. in Las Vegas.
abstract: A new twist on the idea of crowdsourcing speed traps is unveiled at C.E.S. in Las Vegas.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- A feature added to the Cobra iRadar detector may make your smartphone smart enough to help you avoid a ticket.

headline.main: New Feature to Cobra iRadar Detector
